an3.146:4.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an3.146:4.3: Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena—
an3.146:4.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an3.146:5.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an3.146:5.3: Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena—
an3.146:5.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
